Uses of Interface
org.jhotdraw.samples.svg.Gradient

Packages that use Gradient
org.jhotdraw.samples.svg A sample drawing editor with limited support for Scalable Vector Graphics Mobile 1.2 (SVG Mobile 1.2). 
org.jhotdraw.samples.svg.io Classes for reading and writing drawings using the Scalable Vector Graphics SVG Mobile 1.2 file format. 
 

Uses of Gradient in org.jhotdraw.samples.svg

          Represents an SVG LinearGradient.
 class RadialGradient
          Represents an SVG RadialGradient.
 

Fields in org.jhotdraw.samples.svg with type parameters of type Gradient

          Specifies the fill gradient of a SVG figure.
static AttributeKey<Gradient> SVGAttributeKeys.STROKE_GRADIENT
          Specifies the stroke gradient of a SVG figure.
